name: College of Dance
description: Bards who blend artistry and combat, turning battle into graceful performance.

3.Dazzling Footwork: When you take the Dash action or move at least 10 feet on your turn, you can give a creature a penalty. Choose one creature within 5 feet after moving. It has Disadvantage on attacks until start of your next turn. Can do this only once per turn.
3.Bardic Damage: You gain proficiency with Scimitars, and Scimitars count as a Bard weapon for you. When you deal Sneak Attack damage, you can roll your Bardic Inspiration die and add that number to the damage.

6.Leading Evasion: You gain proficiency in Dexterity saving throws if you don't already have it. When a creature you can see within 5 feet fails a Dexterity save, you can use Reaction to grant them Advantage on the save (potentially changing the outcome).

14.Tandem Footwork: When you use Dazzling Footwork, you can affect a number of creatures within 5 feet equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum 1).
